page.title: 17PLAYGROUND GAMES 2
page.content: Yellow Lines is played on a Netball Court.This is a very crazy game.One person has to chase the others round the court.Any number of people can play.Ladders is played by people sitting opposite each other and a caller standing in front of them.The caller shouts a number and the people who have that number run to the caller and back again.The first person back to their place wins a point for their team.Volley Ball has the same rules as the proper game but the net is replaced by the lines of the Netball Court.Off Ground Touch is another chasing game with the rule that a person cannot be tagged if they are off the ground.No one we asked knew where or how these games originated. They seem to be passed on from child to child.
